The Class of 2017, the largest in Cumberland County College’s history, numbered 758. Shelly O. Schneider, Ed.D. is currently the Interim President of Cumberland County College. Evans, acting president; Charles William Elsey; James Lloyd Creech; J. M. Boswell; James H. Taylor and Larry L. Cockrum. On October 3, 2014, university President Dr. James Taylor announced that then-Vice President for Academic Affairs Dr. Larry Cockrum would take over day-to-day operations of the university after the board of trustees meeting on October 15, 2014.
